name: Pixel Color by Numbers Game
description:
Pixel Color is the perfect relaxing app! Choose a page in the coloring book or pick one of your own photos. Just follow the number in the pixel boxes. It's easy and fun. Rediscover the simple joy of coloring!

Key features:

- Easy and intuitive coloring by following the numbers.
- A large choice of coloring pages to satisfy everybody: Monuments, Animals, Portraits, Mandalas, Food and many others.
- Color your own photos from your gallery or by taking a selfie.
- Save your creations and share your timelaps video with your friends via Instagram, Facebook, Messenger, etc.
- Coloring anti-stress pictures.
- New pictures regularly added (premium feature)
- Works offline. No connection needed to relax in the coloring book!

Painting has never been so easy. So do not wait any longer: come and relax on Pixel Color!


Subscription information:

- Subscribe for unlimited access to our Premium features: premium pictures, unlimited import.
- Weekly ($7.99) & yearly ($40.99)*
- Free trial subscription is automatically renewed unless cancelled 24 hours before the renewal
- Payment will be charged to iTunes Account at confirmation of purchase
- Account will be charged for renewal within 24-hours prior to the end of the current period, at the same price
- No cancellation of the current subscription is allowed during active subscription period
- Subscriptions may be managed by the user and auto-renewal may be turned off by going to the user’s Account Settings after purchase
- Any unused portion of a free trial period, if offered, will be forfeited when the user purchases a subscription to that publication, where applicable


Terms of Services & Privacy Policy: http://musicgamingapps.com/pixelcolor


* Price are equal to the value that "Apple's App Store Matrix" determines is the equivalent of the subscription price in $USD.
